fullName.jp: エドガー・ロニ・フィガロ

description.jp: 砂漠の王国フィガロを治める若き王。民衆の利益のためにガストラ帝国と同盟を結んでいたが ケフカとの衝突をきっかけに反旗を翻し 「リターナー」のメンバーと共に戦いに身を投じた。飾らない性格で民に慕われる一方無類の女好きとしても知られている。
description.gl: The young ruler of the desert kingdom of Figaro. For the sake of his subjects, he allied with the Gestahlian Empire, but a conflict with Kefka provides the opportunity for him to devote himself entirely to the Returners' resistance. While beloved by his people for his unpretentious nature, he is also known for being a notorious playboy.

jp.text: 俺の口説きのテクニックも 錆びついたかな？
このコインで決めよう うらみっこなしだぜ
そのセリフ しびれるね！
女性がいるのに口説かない\nそんな失礼な事ができると思うかね？
レディに優しくってのは\n世界の常識なんだよ
俺達にもまだ夢はある\nいや夢をつくりだせる！
俺が死んだら 世界中のレディが悲しむからな

gl.text: Guess my technique's getting a bit rusty...
Let's settle this with the toss of a coin. No regrets、 no hard feelings.
So much for my next suggestion...
Did you think I could be so rude as to meet a lady and not make any moves at all?
Being polite to ladies is common courtesy the whole world over!
I'm finally starting to feel like we have some hope!
If something were to happen to me、 all the world's ladies would grieve!

rank_up_desc.gl: When using Drill (C):\n • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%\n • Royal Pressure, DEF Down II, MAX BRV Down I duration +2

「ドリル【C】」使用時
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する

rank_up_desc.gl:
When using Royal Shock+ (C):
 • 5-hit group magic BRV  attack + group HP  attack that ignores DEF delivered 2 times becomes 4-hit group magic BRV  attack + group HP  attack that ignores DEF delivered 5 times; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%
 • Slight special effect boost after use
rank_up_desc.jp:
「ロイヤルショック＋【C】」使用時
・防御力無視の5HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃
　＋全体HP攻撃を2回行うが
　防御力無視の4HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃
　＋全体HP攻撃を5回行うに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの180％分
・使用後特殊効果の効果小アップ

name.jp: オートボウガンエクステンド

desc.gl:
Auto Crossbow use +2

When using Auto Crossbow:
 • Group ranged BRV attack becomes 5-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 2 times; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
 • Slight BRV damage boost when attacking machinery types
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
 • All targets: 6 turns Royal Pressure
 • Slight boost to 4 turns MAX BRV Up granted to self
 • Granted buff duration +2
 • Higher turn rate

When attacking target afflicted with Royal Pressure:
 • Auto Crossbow becomes Auto Crossbow+, adds following effects:
 • 5-hit group ranged BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 2 times becomes:
 • 4-hit group ranged BRV attack that ignores DEF
 • Group HP attack delivered 3 times
 • Moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 180%

「オートボウガン」の使用回数＋2

・全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃が
　5HIT全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を2回行うに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ

・対象に6ACTION「ロイヤルプレッシャー」付与
・自身に4ACTION「最大BRVアップ」付与の
　効果小アップを追加

弱体効果が付与されたターゲット攻撃時

name.gl: King's Path Decided with a Coin Extension
name.jp: コインで選んだ王の道エクステンド

desc.gl:
When using Royal Shock:
 • 5-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 2 times becomes 5-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 4 times; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
 • Bioblaster use +1

When using Royal Shock+:
 • 5-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack that ignores DEF delivered 2 times becomes 4-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack that ignores DEF delivered 5 times; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
 • Bioblaster use +1
desc.jp:
「ロイヤルショック」使用時
・5HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を2回行うが
　5HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃を4回行うに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限小アップ
・「バイオブラスト」の使用回数＋1

「ロイヤルショック＋」使用時
・防御力無視の5HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃
　＋全体HP攻撃を2回行うが
　防御力無視の4HIT全体魔法BRV攻撃
　＋全体HP攻撃を5回行うに変化し
　合計BRV威力も極大アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限小アップ
・「バイオブラスト」の使用回数＋1
